ygData.subject: Re: Post awhile back on Crafted Locations
ygData.msgSnippet: I have been told the Werewolves of Mistmoore are about Level 28. Belgarth ... __________________________________________________ Do You Yahoo!? Bid and sell
ygData.messageBody:
I have been told the Werewolves of Mistmoore are about
Level 28.

Belgarth

--- "Whitcraft,David" <DWHITCRAFT@...> wrote:
> From: "Whitcraft,David" <DWHITCRAFT@...>
>
> There was an excellent post either earlier this week
> or end of laat week on
> locations on all of the items required for the
> crafted pieces (or many of
> them). If anyone still has this list, could you
> either re-post it or email
> it to me?
>
> If not, can we fill the list back out again?
>
> Aviak Charms, Gauntlets - Aviak Avocents in SK,
> 28-30th level (confirmed)
>
> Frost Totem, Boots - Shamans (High or not?) in
> Perma?
>
> Optic Nerves, Bracer - Evil Eyes anywhere (Beholder,
> 20-24th levelish -
> confirmed)
>
> Werewolf Talons, Breastplate - Werewolves in
> Mistmoore or any of them? What
> level?
>
> Stolen circlet, Greaves - Najena on a necromancer?
> which one?
>
> Fire Totem, Helm - Goblins in Sol A or B? which? And
> what level and
> specifically which goblins?
>
> Eye of Griffon, Vambrace - Any type of Griffon
> (ewwe/awne), just just the
> big mommies? Level 30-35ish? Karanas and Commons.
>
> 3 pieces of the Rune of the Dwarves, Pauldrun -
> Runny Eye, on a goblin
> prolly, but no clue which one. Level 20+ atleast.
>
>
> Can anyone bring some certainty to this list?
> Thanks!
